CustomField.description: Defines the Invoice Contact that will be detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Assignment" and "Invoice To Contact" are used. The Invoice Group By of "Client", "Hiring Manager (Invoice Client)", "PO Number" and "Invoice To Account" will use the Invoice Contact detailed on the Client related to the Assignment. Invoice Group By of "Hiring Manager (Invoice Hiring Manager)" will use the Hiring Manager detailed on the Assignment
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the Invoice Contact that will be detailed on invoices when the Invoice Group By of "Assignment" and "Invoice To Contact" are used.
CustomField.label: Invoice To Contact
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Assignments with Contact as Invoice To Contact
